title: Unspecified Error occured!
body:
I just started my client, and an error appeared. It seems like a new small update is live, but the client can`t update. 

Here is a print screen : 

https://s32.postimg.org/kajatbwf9/Error.jpg

replies.body: It looks like your patcher is trying to scan files, but your OS is blocking it from doing so.  DTN is spot on that our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide can help get this fixed up.  Let us know if you have any issues, and we'd be happy to assist!

Try running the launcher as an admin by right clicking the shortcut and selecting "Run as Administrator". If that doesn't work, make sure your [Permissions are set up properly](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Let me know if that helps.
